author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

In dd4hep, the xml files are processed in order. So the scenario has to be selected accordingly. Also namespace is handled specially - change is needed to one of the plugins

#### PR validation:

Tested with some of the cfg's in test area. But it also needs some of the PR's which are waiting to be integrated to the IB

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx233 Enable processing a full scenario
